ValidationRule.description: if Contact status = Banned or Suspect, then only Compliance Role can move it out of those statuses. *SFDC-13048, Scenario-2
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND ( OR ( ISCHANGED(Contact_Status__c) && ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(Contact_Status__c) , 'Banned' ), ISCHANGED(Contact_Status__c) && ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(Contact_Status__c) , 'Suspect' ), ISCHANGED(Contact_Status__c) && ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(Contact_Status__c) , 'Pending' ) ), OR ( ($Profile.Name = 'Barracuda Partner Affiliate Admin'), ($Profile.Name = 'Barracuda Partner Core Admin'), ($Profile.Name = 'Barracuda Partner Distributor Admin'), ($Profile.Name = 'Barracuda Partner Hybrid Admin'), ($Profile.Name = 'Barracuda Partner MSP Admin') )
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: We're sorry, but only a Compliance User may update the Contact record when the status is Banned, Suspect or Pending. Please reach out to community_help@barracuda.com for assistance.
